# Threads {#threads}
```r
RcppParallel::setThreadOptions(numThreads = 2)
```

# Method choices {#method-choices}
- Large N: `slice_msf` or `flash3d`
- Many clusters K: `slic` with `preserve_k=TRUE`
- Iterative quality: `supervoxels` (parallel updates)

# Grain size {#grain-size}
- For `supervoxels`, start with `grain_size = max(100, nvox / (threads*10))`

# Memory tips {#memory-tips}
- Use SNIC for low memory
- Reduce time points or compress features as needed
